sentences.sContent: The clock in the painting is a symbolic representation of the passage of time.
sentences.sCn: 画上的时钟象征着光阴的流逝。

sentences.sContent: A group of students made representations to the college about the poor standard of the accommodation.
sentences.sCn: 一群学生就恶劣的住宿条件同校方交涉。

sentences.sContent: Minority groups need more effective parliamentary representation.
sentences.sCn: 少数族群需要办事更为高效的议会代表。

sentences.sContent: ...Their answer: Broad-based welfare-state policies hinder women's representation in elite competitive positions...
...The quota system in Sweden ensures women's better representation in government...
...indirect reference and figures of speech; by creating a mental representation that draws on the same brain regions that would be active if the scene were unfolding in real life...

phrases.pCn: 符号表示；符号表征；符号性表象
视觉再现；可视化表示形式
二进制表示法；二进位表示；二元表示
绘画作品；图形表示；立体表示法
数字表示，数字表象；[计]数位表示法

words.tran: 典型的，有代表性的；代议制的
能被代表的；能上演的；能被描绘的
代表；表现；描绘；回忆；再赠送

trans.tranOther: a painting, sign, description etc that shows something
